infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan receipts and documents for transaction entry.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app accesses your contacts to help you split bills and share expenses with friends.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone for voice memos and transaction notes.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app uses tracking to provide personalized financial insights and improve your experience.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to help categorize transactions based on nearby merchants.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app accesses your calendar to schedule bill payment reminders and financial planning events.
